title: Ka Lalpa mi sualah an chhiar
lyrics:
Ka Lalpa misualah an chhiar,
Kan sual aiawhin a thi ta;
A hmabak tih tur an ruat a,
Mahni kraws puin a kal ta.

Tunah Isuan min dil fo si,
'Ka tui a hal e,' a tih chu.

Hlinglukhum leh kawr sen an pe,
Hmelmaten an kalpui ta a;
A hming Luruh hmun lamah chuan,
Sual an nghat, ama chungah chuan.

Kalvari-an hrehawm a phur,
Mi dang an awm lo tanpui tur;
"Ka P, engah nge min kalsan?"
Thlaphangin a au thing leran.

Samari mi'n tui a pe lo,
Aman tui hnar a tichhuak fo;
Thing lera a awm lai khanin,
A pe duh lo - khawdur pawhin.
